texts.SamplePageMessage: A sample page for the GatewayManagement module
texts.GatewayManagement:000002: The gateway is assigned to an active data source. Please, disable or remove the data source first.
texts.GatewayManagement:000003: An error occured on request to the gateway client.
texts.ConfirmRemovingGateway: Do you want to remove the gateway?
texts.Gateway:List:Title: Gateways
texts.Gateway:Name: Name
texts.GatewayStatus:DetailedMessage:New: The gateway is not registered. Please, do so before using it.
texts.GatewayStatus:DetailedMessage:WaitingFor: Waiting for you to register the key using your gateway client...
Gateway Client confirmation is in process, please wait...
texts.GatewayStatus:DetailedMessage:Active: The gateway is registered and is ready to use.
texts.Gateway:Errors:NameEmpty: You should enter a gateway name
texts.Gateway:Errors:IpEmptyOrInvalid: For HTTPS gateway, you should enter a valid IP address
texts.Gateway:Errors:PortEmptyOrInvalid: For HTTPS gateway, you should enter a valid port number
texts.Gateway:Settings:SaveError: An error occured while saving gateway
texts.Gateway:RequestGatewayRegistration:Error: An error occured while requesting gateway registration
texts.Gateway:RegistrationKeyExpired: Registration key is expired, revoke it to try registering the gateway again
texts.Gateway:RegistrationKey:ConfirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke the gateway registration key? If the machine is configured, it will require reconfiguration.
texts.Gateway:CopyKeyToClipboard:Success: Key is copied to your clipboard
texts.Gateway:CancelRegistration:Confirm: Do you want to cancel gateway registration? You'll be able to start it over.
texts.EventBus:List:Title: Event Bus Management
texts.EventBus:Name: Name
texts.StaticKey:Enabled: Gateway static key is enabled. Use it to register new gateways.
texts.StaticKey:Disabled: Gateway static key is disabled. Enable it to register new gateways.
texts.Gateways:Accept:NameRequired: You should specify a gateway name to accept.
